EmailTemplate.name: 2019_Primus_Elite_Keselowski_Campaign.2019_05_15_KCLT_Invitation
EmailTemplate.subject: You're Invited to a Demonstration of Primus Elite & JetWave in Charlotte, May 15
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> HONEYWELL INVITES YOU TO A DEMONSTRATION OF THE PRIMUS ELITE COCKPIT UPGRADE AND JETWAVE WIFI SYSTEM AT WILSON AIR CENTER CHARLOTTE
Honeywell and Joey Meier, chief pilot for two-time NASCAR Championship driver Brad Keselowski and race spotter, are hosting demonstrations of the Primus Elite cockpit display upgrade and JetWave high-speed Wi-Fi system.
Joey will demonstrate Primus Elite from his office on Brad's Lear 45 aircraft. The demonstration will cover all Primus Elite certified aircraft: Global Express, F900EX/C, Legacy 600, Lear 40/45, Citation 550/560, Dornier 328, and GIV/GIV-SP/GV.
Honeywell's experts will demonstrate JetWave hardware and connectivity solutions on its Gulfstream G550 aircraft.
Mark your calendars and plan to attend!
- When: Wednesday, May 15, 2019 - Demonstrations: 9:00 AM - 4:00 PM
- Catered lunch provided by Jim N' Nicks: 12:30 PM - Where: Wilson Air Center Charlotte, 5400 Airport Drive, Charlotte, NC 28208 - RSVP by May 10: Jeremy Snider 1-517-295-9217
FOR OPERATORS ATTENDING THIS DEMONSTRATION! You're eligible to receive a Special Discount when you install a Primus Elite system in 2019. Contact your Honeywell sales manager for details!
